data.title: Hungarian Forints Definition
data.meta_description: Define Hungarian Forints. means the lawful currency of Hungary.
data.text:
The indicated prices are the total prices for the Service, in Hungarian Forints; these are gross prices that already include the amount of VAT.

The consolidated financial statements are prepared and presented in millions of Hungarian Forints (HUF), unless stated otherwise.

For the purpose of the Consolidated Financial Statements, the results and financial position of each Group entity are expressed in Hungarian Forints (HUF), which is the functional currency of the Parent Company and the presentation currency for the Consolidated Financial Statements.

Conversion into Hungarian Forints of Group’s foreign operations that have a functional currency not listed by the National Bank of Hungary is made at the cross rate calculated from Bloomberg’s published rate of the given currency to the USD and NBH’s rate of the HUF to the USD.

Students registered on the Budapest programme may choose to pay the tuition fee in Hungarian Forints.

The amounts in the Consolidated Financial Statements are stated in millions of Hungarian Forints (HUFm), unless stated otherwise.

The Exchange may reclassify the securities of an Issuer particularly if the Issuer has an outstanding balance with the Exchange greater than 500.000,- HUF (five hundred thousand Hungarian Forints) and this debt is undisputed and became overdue more than 60 days ago.

You can easily withdraw Hungarian Forints using your debit card, the fees are much less than if you obtain Forints at a U.S. bank.

Unless expressly agreed otherwise by the Parties, the Price shall be denominated in Hungarian Forints (HUF).

The General Meeting of the Company has taken a Resolution [Resolution No.: Kgy 5./2004.(04.27.)] on the transformation of the registered (‘A series’) Shares of the Company with the face value of HUF 100 namely One Hundred Hungarian Forints into dematerialized securities based on Paragraph 1 Section 408 of Act CXX of 2001.
